devdoc.details: This library handles deposits to and withdrawals from dYdX liquidity pools.

approve(uint256).details: Approves tokens to dYdX without spending gas on every deposit.

params.amount: Amount of the specified token to approve to dYdX.

deposit(uint256).details: Deposits funds to the dYdX pool. Assumes that you have already approved >= the amount to dYdX.

params.amount: The amount of tokens to be deposited.

getBalance().details: Returns the fund's balance of the specified currency in the dYdX pool.

withdraw(uint256).details: Withdraws funds from the dYdX pool.

params.amount: The amount of tokens to be withdrawn.

withdrawAll().details: Withdraws all funds from the dYdX pool.

devdoc.title: DydxPoolController
